name: Cajun Chicken
ingredients: 3 boneless chicken breasts, sliced in thin strips
3 medium green and/or red bell peppers, cut in thin strips, 8 ounces
4 green onions, cut diagonally in 1/2-inch pieces

instructions.en: Toss chicken pieces with Cajun seasoning in a medium bowl.
Heat butter and oil in a large skillet or wok on medium-high heat.
Stir-fry chicken until not quite done.
Add peppers and mushrooms. Stir-fry until peppers are crisp-tender.
If using xanthan gum, mix with seasonings in a small bowl.
Reduce heat to low. Stir in seasonings and cream. Cook until sauce thickens.
Add green onions and toss briefly to combine. Season with more salt if needed.

notes: Makes 4 large servings. Freezing not recommended.
